name: Minecart Excavation
description:
Dig a mining shaft and collect as match Gold as you can. The last cart can take the Gold and bring you Rails.

Controls

E - Use (Take Items, Put Items, Place Rail)
Q - Climbing Rope (Place Rope, Pick up Rope)
Mouse 1 - Mine Blocks (Hold to select multiple)
ESC - Pause Menu (Audio settings)

Credits

Max Schmöcker - Development
Florian Schönlau - Development, Art
Jan Schröder - Music

freesfx.co.uk - Sounds
